TITLE: Converting GNURadio Flowgraph to REDHAWK Component with Docker Support
DESCRIPTION: Command to convert a GNURadio Companion flowgraph (.grc) file into a REDHAWK component with Docker image support.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/gnuradio-redhawk/blob/master/2-docker-aware/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./convert my_flowgraph.grc --docker-image my_flowgraph
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running GNURadio Component Converter
DESCRIPTION: Command to convert a GNURadio companion file (.grc) into a REDHAWK component. Takes an optional output path parameter where the converted component will be generated.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/gnuradio-redhawk/blob/master/1-traditional/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./run.py path/user.grc [output_path]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Docker Image for REDHAWK Component
DESCRIPTION: Command to build the Docker image for a converted GNURadio component so it can be used by Docker-aware GPP hosts.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/gnuradio-redhawk/blob/master/2-docker-aware/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./build-image.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Integration Package and Converter on Development Host
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install both the REDHAWK integration package and component converter tool on a development system. The component converter installation requires root permissions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/gnuradio-redhawk/blob/master/1-traditional/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
sudo make install-cc
make ri
make install-ri
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Docker-GPP for REDHAWK
DESCRIPTION: Command to build and install the Docker-aware GPP version which extends the standard REDHAWK GPP functionality to support containerized components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/gnuradio-redhawk/blob/master/2-docker-aware/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make gpp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Converted REDHAWK Component
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the converted GNURadio component on a domain or development system so it can be referenced in waveforms.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/gnuradio-redhawk/blob/master/2-docker-aware/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./build.sh install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing REDHAWK Integration Package on GPP Host
DESCRIPTION: Commands to build and install the GNURadio REDHAWK integration package on a GPP host system. This installs only the integration components without the conversion tool.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/gnuradio-redhawk/blob/master/1-traditional/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make ri
make install-ri
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Preparing Development Environment for GNURadio REDHAWK
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a development environment with GNURadio Companion and REDHAWK IDE for component development and conversion.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/gnuradio-redhawk/blob/master/2-docker-aware/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make development
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Preparing GNURadio REDHAWK Conversion Environment
DESCRIPTION: Command to ensure the development image and conversion script are available for converting GNURadio flowgraphs to REDHAWK components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/gnuradio-redhawk/blob/master/2-docker-aware/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
make convert geontech/gnuradio-redhawk-development
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting GNURadio Companion in Development Environment
DESCRIPTION: Command to launch GNURadio Companion in the same development environment as the REDHAWK IDE.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/gnuradio-redhawk/blob/master/2-docker-aware/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./gnuradio-companion
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running REDHAWK IDE with Custom Workspace
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the REDHAWK IDE with a specified workspace location on the host system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/geontech/gnuradio-redhawk/blob/master/2-docker-aware/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./rhide --workspace ./workspace
```
